profile_data.summary:
I am an active researcher and developer aiming to bring my research to real life. My research experience covers signal precessing, graphical models, computer vision,  and recently NLP.  My recent research work is all on cross disciplinary topics closely related to medical and health, and financial domains. 
Keep learning and solving new problems.
profile_data.headline: Research Engineer/Scientist at Bloomberg | PhD in Computer Science

experience.locationName: New York, New York, United States
experience.geoLocationName: New York, New York, United States
experience.description: Financial Extraction: I build end-to-end ML/NLP services for Bloomberg News and Bloomberg's Company Financials products.
experience.title: Research Engineer

experience.description:
Build a search engine from scratch to retrieve relevant clinical trials (500K+ trials). My roles include:
1. Automate the backend data pipeline: data aggregation, ETL process, and ElasticSearch index creation. We decoupled this task from the front-end UI by incorporating Spark Jobs in Airflow dags, calling built APIs that are responsible for ML modules. 
2. Achieve the SOTA performance (20+% relative improvement compared with other BERT-based solutions) for ICD-code assignment task on the MIMIC-III benchmark by proposing our Medical Document BERT (MDBERT). MDBERT provides multi-level semantics that can fit well with different downstream natural language understanding tasks in the medical and health domain. (Bronze Impact Award)
3. Build a disease translation service for a better search experience. We ensemble TF-IDF, BioWordVec, and MDBERT (implemented with PyTorch) to map non-standard raw disease names to standard SNOMED indications. By standardizing the disease field, we achieved to improve the 200+% recall rate of common user queries and increase 300+% usage of our service. (Silver Impact Award)


Build a predictive model for business recovery during the Covid-19 pandemic for business decision-making. My role is in data cleaning and modeling. 
Our solution achieved the 0.84 Concordance Correlation Coefficient in predicting the new case and provide solid site recovery prediction insights for business decision making. When modeling, the recovery prediction is a two-step model. First, we predict the #new cases based on the current status of the regions. At this step, we ensemble both the traditional Differentiation equations based model (SIR) and Graph Neural Network where the geographical locations are explicitly leveraged. After that, another function between the new case and business recovery is learned to predict regional business recovery.
experience.title: Machine Learning Scientist at IQVIA

experience.description:
1. Operating and Service System
Inner Management system for service dispatching, taking role for web service development.

2.Recommendation System
Ensemble different collaborative filtering algorithms on Mahout Platform including similarity based and rule-based algorithms. Latent Factor Based algorithms also be attempted, but not work well for real-time response

3.Data Analysis
Big Data Analysis for service quality control and adjust the strategy of server dispatching.
